phrase: I think, therefore I am
author: René Descartes

phrase: Everything I hear, I forget. Everything I see, I remember. Everything I do, I learn
author: Confucius

phrase: The mind that opens up to a new idea never returns to its original size
author: Albert Einstein

phrase: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them
author: Albert Einstein

phrase: Know thyself
author: Socrates

phrase: Wisdom begins in reflection
author: Socrates

phrase: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing
author: Edmund Burke

phrase: Man is the measure of all things
author: Protagoras

phrase: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions
author: Dalai Lama

phrase: To give each his own
author: Ulpian

phrase: Man is by nature a political animal
author: Aristotle

phrase: Life without philosophy is like being blind in a world of colors
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

phrase: Truth is the daughter of time, not of authority
author: Francis Bacon

phrase: Life is a tragedy when seen up close, but a comedy in long-shot
author: Charlie Chaplin

phrase: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him to find it within himself
author: Galileo Galilei

phrase: The real secret of happiness is to take a genuine interest in all the details of daily life
author: William Morris

phrase: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens
author: Jimi Hendrix

phrase: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
author: Aristotle

phrase: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing
author: Socrates

phrase: Justice without force is powerless; force without justice is tyrannical
author: Blaise Pascal

phrase: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice
author: William Jennings Bryan

phrase: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality that guarantees the others
author: Aristotle

phrase: To love is to find in the happiness of another our own happiness
author: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz

phrase: The unexamined life is not worth living
author: Socrates

phrase: We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world
author: Buddha

phrase: The only way to deal with fear is to face it head-on
author: James Patterson

phrase: Cogito, ergo sum
author: René Descartes

phrase: The only thing I know is that I know nothing
author: Socrates

phrase: The unexamined life is a life without meaning
author: Plato

phrase: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
author: Nelson Mandela

phrase: The unexamined life is a life without purpose
author: Aristotle

phrase: I cannot teach anybody anything, I can only make them think
author: Socrates

phrase: The more one knows, the more one realizes how little one knows
author: Voltaire

phrase: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing
author: Edmund Burke

phrase: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
author: Aristotle

phrase: The unexamined life is a life without self-awareness
author: Marcus Aurelius

phrase: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

phrase: Life must be understood backward. But it must be lived forward
author: Søren Kierkegaard
